system.description: The user changes its base Species to that of an Eeveelution matching the Type of an attack the user knows, but doesn't necessarily have on its Active List (ie. having access to Water Pulse means it can become Vaporeon). Using a Normal-Type attack means the user becomes Mega Eevee/Companeon. When it changes species, it swaps its current Basic, Advanced, and Master Abilities for those of the selected species (but retains this Ability), and the user may swap up to 2 attacks on its Active List with attacks in its Repertoire.
